name: Out Of Battery (Holly Boyle)
description:
My submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Control a little robot fellow that can tether to electrical sources. While untethered, you will only have 5 seconds of time before running out of battery and shutting down. Plug back in to regain your charge.

Controls:

Keyboard and Mouse:

  • WASD - Move
  • E - Throw Tether
  • Q - Break Tether
  • Arrow Keys - Aim / Control Objects
  • Escape - Pause

Controller:

  • Left Stick - Move
  • Right Stick - Aim / Control Objects
  • Right Shoulder - Throw Tether
  • Left Shoulder - Break Tether
  • Options / Start - Pause
